00020 
00021 #ifndef SYLPH_H_
00022 #define SYLPH_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Sylph/OS/OS.h"
00025 #include "Sylph/Core/Application.h"
00026 #include "Sylph/Core/Array.h"
00027 #include "Sylph/Core/String.h"
00028 #include "Sylph/Core/Common.h"
00029 #include "Sylph/Core/AppType.h"
00030 #include "Sylph/Core/UncaughtExceptionHandler.h"
00031 
00032 #include <iostream>
00033 
00034 #ifndef SYLPH_NO_SYLPHMAIN
00035 #ifdef SYLPH_OS_MACOSX
00036 int main(int argc, char * argv[], char * envp[], char * apple[]);
00037 #else
00038 int main(int argc, char * argv[]);
00039 #endif
00040 static inline void SylphInit(int argc, char * argv[], char * apple[]) {
00041     Sylph::Application::init(argc, argv, apple, Sylph::APP_TYPE);
00042 }
00043 extern int SylphMain(Sylph::Array<Sylph::String> argv);
00044 
00045 #ifdef SYLPH_OS_MACOSX
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char * argv[], char * envp[], char * apple[]) {
00048     try {
00049         SylphInit(argc, argv, apple);
00050         Array<String> args(argc);
00051         for(int i = 0; i < argc; ++i) {
00052             args[i] = argv[i];
00053         }
00054         return SylphMain(args);
00055     } catch (Sylph::Exception & ex) {
00056         Sylph::UncaughtExceptionHandler::handler->handle(ex);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 #else
00060 
00061 int main(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00062     try {
00063         SylphInit(argc, argv, NULL);
00064         return SylphMain();
00065     } catch (Sylph::Core::Exception & ex) {
00066         Sylph::Core::UncaughtExceptionHandler::handler->handle(ex);
00067     }
00068 }
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #endif
00072 #endif  /* SYLPH_H_ */
00073
